reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Generate insights from your business data
reports.aiSubtitle: Generate reports using natural language queries
reports.aiQuery: Describe the report you want to generate
reports.aiQueryPlaceholder: Example: Show me performance metrics by department this quarter, or List users with completion rates above 80%, or Display recent activity trends by region
exampleQueriesList: Show me all completed workflows by department this month
List users with completion rates above 80%
Display overdue tasks grouped by assigned user
Create a report on workflow trends over the last 30 days
Show me the best performing departments by completion rate
Display all pending notifications for managers
Show workflow steps that took longer than estimated
Display user performance metrics for engineering department
reports.enterQueryToGenerate: Enter a natural language query above to generate a report
reports.noDataFound: No data found for the specified criteria
reports.selectDataSourceFirst: Select a data source to begin
reports.selectColumnsFirst: Select columns to include in your report
reports.addFiltersToRefine: Add filters to refine your report data
reports.noColumnsAvailable: No columns available for this data source
reports.predefinedDescription: Ready-made reports for common business needs
reports.savedDescription: Your custom reports and report templates
reports.createFirstReport: Create your first custom report using the report builder
reports.predefinedReportsWillBeAdded: Predefined reports will be added soon
